channel.title: Help me please
channel.description:
Since they took the tut away I have nothing to look at. I just started making a server so all I really know is like ::npc 1066 and stuff like that. I still dono how to save. heres what I would like to know, if you can only give me 1 or some of the following it would be ok. How to make NPC's rotate How to save your progress of server. How to make it where you can get a no-ip or hamatchi on yours. how to make stores have items how to make it where the NPC'S talk how to make it where if someone clicks the door it trains there str and haybales maked def Im not sure but for me it made all my stats 99 would this provide for the new players? how to make commands such as ::rules or ::gopk how to make it where you can attack other players in the wild. how to make emotes. how to make pk zones how to make it where when i click a monster it dont hit it so fast (Not massing i click it 1 time and it kills it real fast) how to make a npc not die on one hit. WHERE DO I PUT SCRIPTS~?~ how to make it where they start at vrk bank (When i logged on it gave me a pic and i was at vrk mines -.-) how to make drops
I know thats alot but as I said befor if you could answer 1 or more id be really greatfull Thanks!

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

how to make it where if someone clicks the door it trains there str and haybales maked def
download a phonescape/pimpscape source, it would be much easier.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @yoshimtu yoshimtu
item.description:
@yoshimtu wrote:

Since they took the tut away I have nothing to look at.
I just started making a server so all I really know is like ::npc 1066 and stuff like that.
I still dono how to save.
heres what I would like to know, if you can only give me 1 or some of the following it would be ok.
How to make NPC’s rotate
How to save your progress of server.
How to make it where you can get a no-ip or hamatchi on yours.
how to make stores have items
how to make it where the NPC’S talk
how to make it where if someone clicks the door it trains there str and haybales maked def
Im not sure but for me it made all my stats 99 would this provide for the new players?
how to make commands such as ::rules or ::gopk
how to make it where you can attack other players in the wild.
how to make emotes.
how to make pk zones
how to make it where when i click a monster it dont hit it so fast (Not massing i click it 1 time and it kills it real fast)
how to make a npc not die on one hit.
WHERE DO I PUT SCRIPTS~?~
how to make it where they start at vrk bank (When i logged on it gave me a pic and i was at vrk mines -.-)
how to make drops

I know thats alot but as I said befor if you could answer 1 or more id be really greatfull
Thanks!

Read full topic
